info.name: Egypt Tours - Admin API
info.description:
Admin-only API for managing the Egypt Tours Platform.

Requires admin role. Organized by feature folders.

Source: docs/api/

exec: body: { mode: 'raw', raw: JSON.stringify({ refreshToken: pm.environment.get('refreshToken') }) }

request.description:
Login as admin user.

Source: docs/api/auth.md → POST /auth/login

item.name: Trips Management
item.description:
Create, update, delete trips.

Source: docs/api/trips.md

body.raw:
{
  "slug": "new-cairo-tour",
  "destinationId": 1,
  "duration": 1,
  "tripType": "DAY_TOUR",
  "basePrice": 99.00,
  "maxCapacity": 20,
  "bookingMode": "INSTANT",
  "translations": [
    { "locale": "en", "title": "New Cairo Tour", "description": "...", "shortDescription": "..." },
    { "locale": "es", "title": "Nuevo Tour de El Cairo", "description": "...", "shortDescription": "..." },
    { "locale": "ar", "title": "جولة القاهرة الجديدة", "description": "...", "shortDescription": "..." }
  ],
  "itinerary": [{ "time": "08:00", "title": "Hotel Pickup", "description": "..." }],
  "included": ["Transport", "Guide", "Lunch"],
  "excluded": ["Tips"]
}

request.description:
Create new trip.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → POST /admin/trips

Update trip.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → PUT /admin/trips/{id}

Delete trip (soft delete).

Source: docs/api/trips.md → DELETE /admin/trips/{id}

List all trips including drafts.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → GET /admin/trips

item.name: Bookings Management
item.description:
View reand manage all bookings.

Source: docs/api/bookings.md

request.description:
List all bookings.

Source: docs/api/bookings.md → GET /admin/bookings

Get full booking details.

Source: docs/api/bookings.md → GET /admin/bookings/{id}

Update booking status.

Source: docs/api/bookings.md → PATCH /admin/bookings/{id}/status

Process a refund.

Source: docs/api/bookings.md → POST /admin/bookings/{id}/refund

List all users.

Source: docs/api/users.md → GET /admin/users

Get user details with stats.

Source: docs/api/users.md → GET /admin/users/{id}

Update user role.

Source: docs/api/users.md → PATCH /admin/users/{id}/role

Disable user account.

Source: docs/api/users.md → POST /admin/users/{id}/disable

Create destination.

Source: docs/api/content.md → POST /admin/destinations

Update destination.

Source: docs/api/content.md → PUT /admin/destinations/{slug}

item.name: Content Management
item.description:
Manage blog and vlogs.

Source: docs/api/content.md

request.description:
Create blog post.

Source: docs/api/content.md → POST /admin/blog

Update blog post.

Source: docs/api/content.md → PUT /admin/blog/{slug}

Delete blog post.

Source: docs/api/content.md → DELETE /admin/blog/{slug}

Create vlog.

Source: docs/api/content.md → POST /admin/vlogs

List reviews for moderation.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → GET /admin/reviews

Approve a review.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → POST /admin/reviews/{id}/approve

Reject a review.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → POST /admin/reviews/{id}/reject

Reply to review as business.

Source: docs/api/trips.md → POST /admin/reviews/{id}/reply

Get dashboard statistics.

Source: docs/api/admin.md → GET /admin/dashboard

Get revenue report.

Source: docs/api/admin.md → GET /admin/reports/revenue

Get popular trips.

Source: docs/api/admin.md → GET /admin/reports/popular-trips
